posts._title: Elfi Mikesch – Mondo Lux – Die Bilderwelten des Werner Schroeter AKA Mondo Lux : The Visual Universe of Werner Schroeter (2011)
posts.title: Mondo Lux – Die Bilderwelten des Werner Schroeter
posts.excerpt: Werner Schroeter was one of the most significant proponents of New German Cinema. Schroeter was diagnosed with cancer in 2006. At the time, he was working for the Kunsthalle Düsseldorf gallery on a musical piece entitled ‘Schönheit der Schatten’ (The Beauty of Shadows) based on the works of Robert Schumann and Heinrich Heine. For Schroeter, …

posts.title: Airstrip – Aufbruch der Moderne, Teil III
posts.excerpt: About the film:Imagine an airspace into which a bomb has been dropped. The bomb has not reached the site of its detonation, but there is no way to stop its speedy approach. The time between the bomb’s release and its explosion is neither the future (for the ineluctable destruction has not yet happened) nor the …

posts._title: Heinz Emigholz – Parabeton – Pier Luigi Nervi und Römischer Beton AKA Parabeton – Pier Luigi Nervi and Roman Concrete (2012)
posts.title: Parabeton – Pier Luigi Nervi und Römischer Beton
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:The film presents 17 extant buildings by Italian master-builder Pier Luigi Nervi in Italy and France and 10 examples of Ancient Roman architecture made of Opus caementitium.
